definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: She tries to back track, but the President simply walks away.
sentences.chinese: 她试图重新回到话题，但总统一言不发地走开了。

sentences.english: The papal captain have vainly endeavoured to induce his wife to remain behind him .
sentences.chinese: 教廷的队长曾白费力气地试图说服妻子留下不去。

sentences.english: Don’t be tempted to leave any of the purchase on the counters.
sentences.chinese: 不要试图把买回来的东西放在台子上。

sentences.english: So, what was the concept Akon and Jackson tried to deliver on the song?
sentences.chinese: 那么阿肯和杰克逊试图通过这首歌传递什么理念呢？

sentences.english: I'm trying to displace him in his job.
sentences.chinese: 我在试图取代他的工作。

sentences.english: Lyon claim that Chelsea's attempts to sign midfielder Michael Essien have all but collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 里昂宣称切尔西试图签下中场埃辛的事情以失败告终。

sentences.english: They're trying to blast away the face of the rock.
sentences.chinese: 他们试图炸开岩石的表面。

sentences.english: Each side tries to anticipate the actions of the other.
sentences.chinese: 每一方都试图预测另一方的行动。

sentences.english: Marty tried to keep his head during the fire.
sentences.chinese: 马帝在火场中试图保持镇静。

sentences.english: After three years, Deborah tried to break off the relationship and escape from Joshua.
sentences.chinese: 三年后，黛博拉试图结束这段关系，逃离约夏的掌控。

sentences.english: Never try to be anything you aren’t.
sentences.chinese: 切勿试图成为一个不真实的你。

sentences.english: And universities try to make themselves bigger andstronger to get a better ranking.
sentences.chinese: 学校也试图使自己变得更大更强来获得更好的排名。

sentences.english: Carnap tried to define causality from the angle of semantics.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔纳普试图从语义学角度来定义因果必然性。

sentences.english: What the drawing is trying to express is very conspicuous.
sentences.chinese: 这幅图试图表达的信息是非常明显的。

sentences.english: Japanese firms have tried to be as penny-pinching on pay in their foreign operations as they have at home.
sentences.chinese: 日本企业在外国试图像它们在国内那样小气。

sentences.english: It tries to shoo the finches away, but a gruesome kind of artistry comes into play here.
sentences.chinese: 它试图决定离开，但是加拉的可怕的艺术性进场。

definition: to try hard to/to strive to
to do sth by force/Taiwan pr. [qiang3 xing2]
to make a supreme effort/at all costs
to want to/to feel like/to fancy/to care for sb/desirous of
to try/to make an attempt/to think of a way (to accomplish sth)
to seize an opportunity/to take advantage of situation
